hero.core_tension: Decision tension between steady footfall and short appointment-driven spikes during event windows.
hero.setting: Large bookstore interior transformed into a branded pop space. Clean negative space around focal area.
hero.persona: Retail operator and brand studio lead collaborating over spatial plans.
hero.action: They frame a windowed display together while one points to a tablet with scheduling overlays.
hero.urgency_symbol: Stacked ticket-stub motif held like a fan to imply staged windows and limited slots.
props: Stack of ticket stubs as a pattern
Matte product mockups on a pedestal
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on faces and the display. Soft shadows to keep negative space clean.
hero.alt: Operator and studio lead aligning a branded pop display, ticket stubs in hand

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings with radial nodes connected by arcs representing events, inventory, and footfall spikes.
elements: Tokens for featured SKUs and collector cohorts
signal_map.motion: Sweep from outer steady ring inward to a bright central node indicating concentrated demand.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with confident highlights in brand color and metallic accents to suggest premium timing.
signal_map.alt: Diagram rings and arcs showing event windows focusing demand to a central node
